nodes.text: A librarian was an individual tasked with the upkeep and oversight of a library, often with the purpose of aiding any person in finding what they seek in a library, be it a book or digital item. One such librarian was Jocasta Nu, who worked in the Jedi Archives as the Chief Librarian. Sometimes, a droid would serve in place of a librarian, such as at the Ha Zurh Library and Records Office on Kamino.
